main.input

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.input.ProjectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject

    @Service
public class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject
    This class provides the logic which RESTHandler calls upon to deliver its functionality.
    See Also:
    RESTHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectService()
      Creates a default ProjectService object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectService

        public ProjectService()
        Creates a default ProjectService object. If previously stored projects or ID seeds are available, they are loaded into the object.
        See Also:
        LocalFileManager

    • Method Detail

      • createID

        public java.lang.String createID()
        Creates a one-way hash of the ID seed.
        Returns:
        A 6-letter substring of the SHA-256 hash of the ID seed.

      • createCanvas

        public Canvas createCanvas(java.lang.String projectID)
        Creates a default canvas measuring 200*200px.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        Returns:
        A default, empty canvas.
        See Also:
        Canvas

      • addLayer

        public Canvas addLayer(java.lang.String projectID)
        Adds a layer to the canvas which is specified by the project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        Returns:
        The canvas including the layer which was added.

      • addShape

        public Canvas addShape(java.lang.String projectID,
                       int layerIndex,
                       java.lang.String shapeClass)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                       java.lang.InstantiationException
        Adds a shape to a specified layer within the canvas, which is specified by the project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        layerIndex - Is used to access the layer to which the shape shall be added.
        shapeClass - Specifies the type of shape which is to be added, in order to call default constructors.
        Returns:
        A canvas including the added shape.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if the shape class could not be found.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Thrown if the shape class constructor could not be called.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Thrown if an instance of the shape class could not be created.

      • editCanvas

        public Canvas editCanvas(java.lang.String projectID,
                         double width,
                         double height)
        Modifies the width/height of a given canvas.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        width - Specifies the new canvas width.
        height - Specifies the new canvas height.
        Returns:
        The canvas featuring the updated measurements.

      • editLayer

        public Canvas editLayer(java.lang.String projectID,
                        int layerIndex,
                        boolean isVisible)
        Sets the visibility of a given layer.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        layerIndex - Is used to retrieve the desired layer from within the canvas.
        isVisible - Sets the layer (and therefore all of its shapes) to visible/invisible.
        Returns:
        A canvas where the visibility of a given layer within it has been modified

      • editShape

        public Canvas editShape(java.lang.String projectID,
                        int layerIndex,
                        int shapeIndex,
                        Shape shape)
        Modifies a shape within a given layer of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        layerIndex - Is used to retrieve the desired layer from within the canvas.
        shapeIndex - Is used to retrieve the desired shape from within the layer.
        shape - Passes the modified shape to the function
        Returns:
        Returns a canvas with a shape, which now includes the updated parameters.

      • transformShape

        public Canvas transformShape(java.lang.String projectID)
        Modifies the visual representation of a shape within a certain layer using the SVG format's inbuilt transform parameters.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        Returns:
        A canvas where the specified shape is now modified in accordance with SVG's inbuilt transform parameters.

      • deleteLayer

        public Canvas deleteLayer(java.lang.String projectID,
                          int layerIndex)
        Deletes a layer from the specified canvas.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        layerIndex - Specifies the layer which the user wishes to delete.
        Returns:
        A canvas without the layer specified by layerIndex.

      • deleteShape

        public Canvas deleteShape(java.lang.String projectID,
                          int layerIndex,
                          int shapeIndex)
        Deletes a certain shape within a layer of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        layerIndex - Specifies the layer within which the user wishes to delete the shape.
        shapeIndex - Specifies the exact shape which the user wishes to delete.
        Returns:
        A canvas without the deleted shape.

      • download

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> download(java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                          java.lang.String type)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                          org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException
        Downloads a picture of the canvas in a format of choice.
        Parameters:
        projectID - Is used to retrieve the canvas based on the ID.
        type - Specifies the desired file format.
        Returns:
        A SVG, JPG or PNG file, which represents the canvas at the time of download.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException - If transcoding to the desired image format fails.

      • getProjects

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Canvas> getProjects()
        Returns:
        A Map of project IDs and corresponding canvasses.

        Parameters:

        Removes an observer from the list of active observers.
        Specified by:
        removeObserver in interface Subject
        Parameters:
        o - Passes the specific observer to the function in order to remove it.
        See Also:
        Subject

        public void notifyObservers()
        Notifies the observers of a ProjectService object whether seedCounter or projects have been modified.
        Specified by:
